us.radiri.merc.part

Class ParticleEmitter

  • java.lang.Object
    • us.radiri.merc.env.AdvancedMercEntity
      • us.radiri.merc.part.ParticleEmitter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MercEntity, Renderable, Updatable

    public class ParticleEmitter
extends AdvancedMercEntity
    An object that will emit particle from a given point in a given direction, at a given speed (run-on!).
    Author:
    wessles

    • Constructor Detail

      • ParticleEmitter

        public ParticleEmitter(Rectangle spawnarea,
               Vec2 validangle,
               Vec2 grav,
               float percentchance,
               Color color,
               float size,
               boolean shrink,
               float speed,
               float damp,
               int lifeinframes)
        Parameters:
        spawnarea - The area in which a particle may spawn.
        validangle - The 2 valid angles in between which any particle can thrust itself out of spawnarea with.
        grav - The value that adds to the x and y of each particle each frame.
        percentchance - The percent chance that a particle will spawn.
        color - The color of the particles.
        size - The size of the particles.
        shrink - The value by which the size of the particles will be multiplied each frame.
        speed - The speed of the particles.
        damp - The value by which the velocity of a particle will be multiplied each frame.
        lifeinframes - The amount of frames that will pass a single particle before death/removal.

        Description copied from class: AdvancedMercEntity
